questions.question_text:
For your implementation, the following tables are extended from each other:
• Incident table is extended from Task table.
• Super Incident table is extended from Incident table.

In this situation, which table(s) are Parent, Child and Base tables? (Choose five.)

choices.F: Incident table is a Parent table
choices.E: Task table is a Child table
choices.A: Super Incident table is a Parent table
choices.C: Super Incident table is a Base table
choices.G: Super Incident table is a Child table
choices.H: Task table is a Parent table
choices.D: Incident table is a Base table
choices.B: Incident table is a Child table

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BFGHI
B. Incident table is a Child table
F. Incident table is a Parent table
G. Super Incident table is a Child table
H. Task table is a Parent table
I. Task table is a Base table

Selected Answer: BFGHI
the answewr is BFGHI

Someone explain this one. Why is it choose 5 and not 3? 

Wouldn't it be : 
B. Incident Table is a Child Table 
C. Super Incident Table is a Base Table
H. Task Table is a Parent Table

???

comments.content:
Nevermind my brain gets it now. 
B, F, G, H, I is correct.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Performance Analytics

questions.question_text: What capability allows users to create dashboards with widgets to visualize data over time in order to identify areas of improvement?
Which type of ServiceNow script runs on the web browser?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Client script

choices.D: Tables which allow write access to other applications
choices.E: Tables within the existing application scope

questions.question_text: When selecting the Target table for an import, which tables can you select? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BDE
Yes, the answer is BDF, found on page 176 of the SA fundamentals - Vancouver edition

Selected Answer: BDE
BDE is correct
BDE is correct. Page 391 of the ServiceNow Administration Fundamentals - Tokyo Edition.

choices.D: Script that sets the answer variable to true or false
